name: Cap of Human Guise
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Ratfolk/New Racial Rules/Ratfolk Magic Items/Cap of Human Guise

sections.body: This threadbare hat allows its wearer to alter her appearance as with a disguise self spell, except she can only appear as a plainly dressed Small human child, adult halfling, or adult gnome, such as a peasant, blacksmith, or shopkeeper. The wearer can slightly alter the cap's appearance as part of the disguise, but otherwise must match the overall unremarkable look of the illusory form.
